net.dean.jraw.http

Class Credentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.http.Credentials

  • public final class Credentials
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for handling any kind of Reddit user and OAuth2 credentials

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthenticationMethod getAuthenticationMethod()
      Gets how these Credentials are to be used
      java.lang.String getClientId()
      Gets the OAuth2 app's ID.

      Gets the OAuth2 app's secret key.
      java.lang.String getPassword() 
      java.lang.String getUsername() 
      static Credentials oauth2App(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String clientId)
      Creates a new Credentials object for a Reddit app whose type is 'installed app'
      static Credentials oauth2Script(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String clientSecret)
      Creates a new Credentails object for a Reddit app whose type is 'web app'

      Creates a new Credentails object for a Reddit app whose type is 'web app'

      • getAuthenticationMethod

        public AuthenticationMethod getAuthenticationMethod()
        Gets how these Credentials are to be used
        Returns:
        The AuthenticationMethod

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername()

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()

      • getClientId

        public java.lang.String getClientId()
        Gets the OAuth2 app's ID. Applicable for all OAuth app types.
        Returns:
        The app's ID

      • getClientSecret

        public java.lang.String getClientSecret()
        Gets the OAuth2 app's secret key. Applicable for all OAuth app types, however, for 'installed app' app types, the secret will always be an empty string.
        Returns:
        The secret value for the application

      • standard

        public static Credentials standard(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password)
        Creates new new Credentials object for "normal" (non-OAuth2) authentication
        Parameters:
        username - The username
        password - The password
        Returns:
        A new Credentials

      • oauth2App

        public static Credentials oauth2App(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password,
                    java.lang.String clientId)
        Creates a new Credentials object for a Reddit app whose type is 'installed app'
        Parameters:
        username - The username
        password - The password
        clientId - The publicly-available app ID
        Returns:
        A new Credentials

      • oauth2Script

        public static Credentials oauth2Script(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String clientId,
                       java.lang.String clientSecret)
        Creates a new Credentails object for a Reddit app whose type is 'web app'
        Parameters:
        username - The username
        password - The password
        clientId - The publicly-available app ID
        clientSecret - The secret value for the application
        Returns:
        A new Credentials

      • oauth2Webapp

        public static Credentials oauth2Webapp(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String clientId,
                       java.lang.String clientSecret)
        Creates a new Credentails object for a Reddit app whose type is 'web app'
        Parameters:
        username - The username
        password - The password
        clientId - The publicly-available app ID
        clientSecret - The secret value for the application
        Returns:
